name: Anemoia (USofEurasia)
description:
Manage a store permanently stuck in a time loop in the 80's! 

Play mini-games to find the wanted items in your gigantic shop!

Credits:

GP : Morigan Letourneau, Yann Gigez, Manon Wimmer, Romain Cordeau-Mbiya, Ema Ouardi

GA : Yann Gigez, Adriana Garic, Ema Ouardi

GD : Kolawole Ogundowole, Julien Quenneville
